frappe/mcp

lets your Frappe app act as an MCP server for AI tool integration

View on index · View in 3D Map

Related repos

  • Curated list of MCP servers for AI integrations and tools
  • Framework for adding automation and custom assistants to Frappe apps—handle tasks, build assistants, integrate LLMs; early stage, not yet released
  • turn any MCP tool into an OpenAPI server for your AI apps
  • Curated list of MCP servers for connecting AI models to tools and data sources
  • MCP server for fast, token-efficient AI access to API and code docs
  • Allows AI models to interact with a Dokploy server
  • lets ai agents manage cloudflare stuff with mcp servers
  • lets ai tools access dev.to articles and users with mcp
  • self-hosted MCP gateway and registry for AI agents
  • Taskade MCP—server and codegen for building AI agent tools from OpenAPI APIs, connect agents to external platforms like Claude and Cursor
